results.title: Jen Psaki, Once the Voice of Biden, Moves to an Anchor Chair
results.abstract: The former White House press secretary will start hosting a weekly MSNBC talk show on March 19. As for the president, “I am not going to gratuitously attack him.”

results.title: Sex Cult’s ‘Lieutenant’ Gets Over 4 Years in Prison for Abetting Abuse
results.abstract: Isabella Pollok’s lawyers had argued that she should not serve time for helping Lawrence Ray, saying she had become a “broken automaton.” But a judge said she had choices.

results.title: Bronx Grandmother Charged With Stabbing 7-Year-Old Granddaughter

results.title: Alligator Kills 85-Year-Old Florida Woman as She Walks Her Dog
results.abstract: Serious injuries caused by alligators are rare in Florida, state wildlife officials said, although this was at least the third fatal encounter in the past year.

results.title: Superintendent Resigns After Third Grader Found His Gun in School Bathroom
results.abstract: Robby Stuteville, superintendent of the Rising Star Independent School District in Texas, left his gun in an elementary school bathroom, where it was discovered by a student.

media.caption: Robby Stuteville submitted his resignation as superintendent of the Rising Star Independent School District after he left a gun in a bathroom at the district’s elementary school on Jan. 20.

results.title: Strong Democratic Showing in Wisconsin Court Race Sets Up a Frenzied Finish
results.abstract: Democratic turnout was high in the Tuesday primary for the State Supreme Court, ahead of a costly general election that will decide the future of abortion rights and gerrymandered maps in the state.

media.caption: Janet Protasiewicz, a liberal, and Daniel Kelly, a conservative, advanced on Tuesday to the April general election for an open seat on Wisconsin’s Supreme Court.
